amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 115-187 to require the Secretary to address employment-related challenges in rural areas and among members of federally recognized Indian tribes in the recommendations provided to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kilmer amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Kilmer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kilmer amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
